item.title: This Plugin... will make vizard VERY HAPPY
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:382864”]Imagine putting a water block on that then moving around.

Massive sky-floods everywhere.[/quote]I highly suggest reading the plugin information. It clearly states water, lava, gravel, sand, and dirt are not counted when finding the blocks of a ship/boat.

Read full topic

item.title: This Plugin... will make vizard VERY HAPPY
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:15, topic:382840”]I’ve seen that plugin, it is cool, but I don’t know about it being on the official server, it would make it too easy to travel.

Anyhow, is it even available for bukkit? (since we soon won’t use hey0)[/quote]
Any idea when the switch will be? =P
OT:Yeah it would make traveling kinda easy and would give an unfair advantage.

Read full topic
